mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie SET movieName=#{movieName}, director=#{director}, actor= #{actor}, runTime = #{runTime}, openDate = #{openDate}, movieAge = #{movieAge}, cateNum = #{cateNum}, screenType = #{screenType}, thumb1 = #{thumb1}, thumb2 = #{thumb2}, thumb3 = #{thumb3}, story = #{story}
INSERT INTO cinemaFile (movieNum, newName, oriName, rdate) VALUES (#{movieNum}, #{newName}, #{oriName}, #{rdate})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.`cateName` FROM `movie` a LEFT JOIN `cate` b ON a.cateNum = b.cateNum ORDER BY a.`movieNum` DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
SELECT a.*, b.`cateName` FROM `movie` a LEFT JOIN `cate` b ON a.cateNum = b.cateNum ORDER BY a.`movieNum` DESC
SELECT a.*, b.region2Name,b.region2Num FROM region1 a JOIN region2 b ON a.region1Num = b.region1Num WHERE a.region1Num = #{region1Num}
SELECT a.* FROM `theater` a JOIN `region2` AS b ON a.region1Num = b.region1Num AND a.region2Num = b.region2Num WHERE a.`region1Num` = #{region1Num} AND a.region2Num = #{region2Num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO theater SET thName = #{thName}, region1Num = #{region1Num}, region2Num = #{region2Num}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, zip = #{zip}, roomName = #{roomName}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.region1Name, c.region2Name, d.*, e.movieName FROM `theater` a LEFT JOIN `region1` b ON a.region1Num = b.region1Num LEFT JOIN `region2` c ON a.region1Num = c.region1Num AND a.region2Num = c.region2Num INNER JOIN `movieInfo` d ON a.theaterNum = d.theaterNum INNER JOIN `movie` e ON d.movieNum = e.movieNum ORDER BY d.movieInfoNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cinemaFile SET movieNum = #{movieNum}, newName = #{newName}, oriName =#{oriName}, rdate = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT a.thName ,a.theaterNum, a.region1Num, a.region2Num, a.addr1,a.addr2, b.`no`, b.roomName, b.totalSeats FROM `theater` a INNER JOIN `room` b ON a.theaterNum = b.theaterNum ORDER BY a.theaterNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
SELECT * FROM `theater` a INNER JOIN `room` b ON a.theaterNum = b.theaterNum WHERE a.`region1Num` = #{region1Num} AND a.`region2Num` = #{region2Num}

SELECT a.*, b.region1Name, c.region2Name, d.*, e.movieName, e.movieAge, e.runTime FROM `theater` a LEFT JOIN `region1` b ON a.region1Num = b.region1Num LEFT JOIN `region2` c ON a.region1Num = c.region1Num AND a.region2Num = c.region2Num INNER JOIN `movieInfo` d ON a.theaterNum = d.theaterNum INNER JOIN `movie` e ON d.movieNum = e.movieNum WHERE DATE(playDate) = DATE(NOW()) ORDER BY d.movieInfoNum DESC
